definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: The amount of pesticides present as residues on food is miniscule.
sentences.chinese: 食品上的農藥殘餘量總量其實是很少的。

sentences.english: The design bases of rapid determination meter photoelectricity system of pesticide residues were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了“殘留農藥速測儀”光電系統的設計依據。

sentences.english: But apples are also one of the most pesticide-contaminated fruits and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 但是蘋果也是農藥殘留最多的蔬果之一。

sentences.english: Objective To explore effects of residues of organochlorine pesticides on reproductive endocrine in human.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究有機氯農藥人體內殘留對生殖內分泌的影響。

sentences.english: In others, suicides in women who ingest pesticides need to be addressed.
sentences.chinese: 另一些國家則需要處理婦女吞食農藥自殺的問題。

sentences.english: Two farm workers were rushed to the hospital after being poisoned by pesticides while harvesting grapes.
sentences.chinese: 兩個農場工人在收穫葡萄時農藥中毒而被急送醫院。

sentences.english: These results would be a base for protection of the rice culture with the phytochemical pesticides.
sentences.chinese: 本研究爲開發防治稻曲病的植物源農藥奠定了基礎。

sentences.english: It is the first time that biopesticides are being used on a large scale in Africa against locusts.
sentences.chinese: 這是第一次正在非洲的一個蝗蟲大規模使用生物農藥。

sentences.english: An analytical method of imidacloprid residue in vegetable soybean by high-performance liquid chromatography(HPLC) was developed.
sentences.chinese: 採用高效液相色譜法測定毛豆中吡蟲啉農藥殘留。

sentences.english: This will involve ever-increasing quantities of agricultural chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 這將涉及不斷增加的數量的化學農藥。

sentences.english: The wettable powder is one of the four main formulations in pesticide processing.
sentences.chinese: 農藥可溼性粉劑是農藥加工四大劑型之一。

sentences.english: The wettable powder is one of the four main formulations in pesticide processing.
sentences.chinese: 農藥可溼性粉劑是農藥加工四大劑型之一。

sentences.english: A fast and convenient method for the determination of trace residues of organophosphorus and(carbamate) pesticides in pond water was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 測定池塘水中有機磷和氨基甲酸酯農藥殘留摺合總量。

sentences.english: Pesticide plant resources are abundant in Chaoshan area of Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: 潮汕地區農藥植物資源十分豐富。

sentences.english: Diagnostic criteria and principles of management of occupational acute organophosphates poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 職業性急性有機磷農藥中毒診斷標準及處理原則。

sentences.english: The results also showed that there was no organochlorine pesticide residue in major tobacco growing soils in Yunnan.
sentences.chinese: 結果也表明雲南煙區土壤基本沒有有機氯農藥殘留。

definition: norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to cross the limit/to be over the accepted norm/excessive
